com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface INeedObjectWithPageList

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreatePageGroupCommand
public interface INeedObjectWithPageList

A class implements INeedObjectWithPageList to indicate that it will initialize and populate a list of pages. This interface is turns on the ability to maintain a list of pages. Classes that wish to contain such a list would implement this INeedObjectWithPageList interface in conjunction with another class that would implement IHoldPageList. The implementor of this interface is responsible for creating an IPageList, calling the IPageList "init" method, passing it back to the implementor of IHoldPageList with setPageList method of IHoldPageList and adding elements to the list of type PageListData. Typically the code below: IPageList iPageList=new PageList(); iPageList.init(); m_objectWithPageList.setPageList(iPageList); // adding a test to allow the caller the option of not collecting a page list if (m_objectWithPageList!=null) { IPageList iPageList=m_objectWithPageList.getPageList(); iPageList.add(new PageListData(pageHeader.relativePage, pageHeader.sectionName)); } // if Example actual usage: DocumentViewer is an example of a class that implements IHoldPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand implements the interface INeedObjectWithPageList. This allows DocumentViewer to store and retrieve the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand. To turn the page list interface on DocumentViewer calls setObjectWithPageList. CreatePageGroupCommand checks to see if page list was requested by the caller in this case it was requested by DocumentViewer. Since the page list was requested, CreatePageGroupCommand initializes the page list and passes it back to DocumentViewer by calling setPageList method of DocumentViewer. In addition CreatePageGroupCommand populates the page list as it downloads pages inside the execute method. PrinterControl is an example of a class that uses the "has a" realtionship with DocumentViewer. To obtain the list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand, PrinterControl calls DocumentViewer's getPageList method. Once the PrinterControl has a copy of the page list, PrinterControl can use getFirst and/or getNext to examine the list of pages downloaded.

See Also:
IHoldPageList

Method Summary
 void setObjectWithPageList(IHoldPageList iHoldPageList)
          Sets the object to be used to acquire the page list.
 

Method Detail

setObjectWithPageList

public void setObjectWithPageList(IHoldPageList iHoldPageList)
Sets the object to be used to acquire the page list.

Parameters:
iHoldPageList - object to be used to acquire a list of pages downloaded by the CreatePageGroupCommand.
